data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Ee, GALA, woilo gòoi ma, siɛgi zu gè kpalagi wosu da!
Ta ti-nɛgi ɠaalizu eɠɛ boɠa zɔkpɔi,
é ʋilisu dɔɔɠuzu telebo nui ma.
Ta ɓɔɠɔ zasulɔɔzu kpɔɛ ɲɔu wogaiti su,
Ti ɗa yaavaiti kpɛtɛ, ti ɠɛ ma:
Kɛlɛ GALA ka mɛɛin ʋilisu ti ma ga kulafilibai,
Telebo nui ɠa ɠoozunɛɛzu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-fai zu, é lɔɔɠu pɔ bɛ.
